form.name: PHCT Household & Individual Encounter Form, v3.6 (Xforms)

number_of_hours_income_generated_activit.openmrs_concept: 6145^NUMBER OF HOURS INCOME GENERATED ACTIVITIES IN PAST WEEK^99DCT

number_of_hours_non-income_generated_act.openmrs_concept: 6146^NUMBER OF HOURS NON-INCOME GENERATED ACTIVITIES IN PAST WEEK^99DCT

number_of_times_to_health_facility_due_t.openmrs_concept: 6147^NUMBER OF TIMES TO HEALTH FACILITY DUE TO HEALTH ISSUES IN PAST FOUR WEEKS^99DCT

money_ksh_spent_on_medical_issues_in_pas.openmrs_concept: 6148^MONEY (KSH) SPENT ON MEDICAL ISSUES IN PAST FOUR WEEKS^99DCT

infant_18_months_and_younger_enrolled_hi.openmrs_concept: 1998^INFANT 18 MONTHS AND YOUNGER, ENROLLED HIV CLINIC^99DCT

number_of_hours_since_last_meal_prior_to.openmrs_concept: 7005^NUMBER OF HOURS SINCE LAST MEAL PRIOR TO BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST^99DCT

hypertensive_patient_hypertension_care_p.openmrs_concept: 7448^HYPERTENSIVE PATIENT HYPERTENSION CARE PROGRAM ENROLLMENT STATUS^99DCT

diabetic_patient_diabetes_care_program_e.openmrs_concept: 7449^DIABETIC PATIENT DIABETES CARE PROGRAM ENROLLMENT STATUS^99DCT

name_of_facility_to_which_patient_is_ref.openmrs_concept: 7637^NAME OF FACILITY TO WHICH PATIENT IS REFERRED, FREETEXT^99DCT

patient_reported_number_of_times_previou.openmrs_concept: 8616^PATIENT REPORTED NUMBER OF TIMES PREVIOUSLY TESTED FOR HIV^99DCT

hiv_positive_hiv_care_program_enrollment.openmrs_concept: 6152^HIV POSITIVE HIV CARE PROGRAM ENROLLMENT STATUS^99DCT

reason_for_not_enrolling_in_hiv_program_.openmrs_concept: 7010^REASON FOR NOT ENROLLING IN CARE PROGRAM, IF HIV+^99DCT

reason_for_declining_hiv_test_from_hct_p.openmrs_concept: 6169^REASON FOR DECLINING HIV TEST FROM HCT PROGRAM^99DCT

difficult_to_test_one_child_and_not_othe.openmrs_concept: 6167^DIFFICULT TO TEST ONE CHILD AND NOT OTHERS^99DCT

most_at_risk_person_getting_hiv_infectio.openmrs_concept: 6578^MOST AT RISK PERSON GETTING HIV INFECTION^99DCT

health_centre_referral_child_less_than_1.openmrs_concept: 6189^HEALTH CENTRE REFERRAL, CHILD LESS THAN 18 MONTHS OLD^99DCT

repeat_hiv_testing_in_three_to_six_month.openmrs_concept: 6191^REPEAT HIV TESTING IN THREE TO SIX MONTHS^99DCT

subjective_patient_health_condition_asse.openmrs_concept: 6345^SUBJECTIVE PATIENT HEALTH CONDITION ASSESSMENT, BY HCT COUNSELOR^99DCT

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Invalid Provider ID. Please check and re-enter.
Invalid Household ID. (Note: The ID may already have been assigned.) Please check and re-enter.
Number of adults must be 0 or more.
This Number must be 0 or more. If number of adults is 0 you cannot have 0 children.
Number of eligible adults must be 0 or more but not more than number of adults in the household.
Number of eligible children must be 0 or more but not more than number of children in the household
Return date must be after today.
Number of bed nets must be positive.
Cannot be less than 0
Cannot be less than 0
Cannot be less than 0
Cannot be less than 0
This number cannot be more than people in household nor be less than 0.
Number of children in school must be less than or equal to the number in household and cannot be less than 0.
Invalid HCT ID. (Note: The ID may already have been assigned.) Please check and re-enter.
Invalid HCT ID. (Note: The ID may already have been assigned.) Please check and re-enter.
Birth dates must be before today.
Age must be between 0 and 110.
Age must be between 0 and 11.

bind.constraint: (. = '0' or regex(., '\d{8,12}')) and review('Phone Number', .) and review('Year of Birth', ../approximate_age)
bind.jr:constraintMsg: Invalid Phone Number. Please check and re-enter.
Phone numbers do not match. Go back and confirm both.
Household already has a head or this is a non-resident individual-'Can't be household head'.
A week has 168 hours
A week has 168 hours
Cannot be less than 0
Cannot be less than 0
LMP date cannot be in the future!

bind.relevant: ../../pregnancy_status/value='0' and (today() - ../../last_menstrual_period_date/value > 35 and today() - ../../last_menstrual_period_date/value < 365) and (../../test_outcome='Refer patient to a HIV Clinic' or ../../hiv_test_result_previously/value='703^POSITIVE^99DCT')

bind.calculate: if(../../patient/approximate_age < 156 and (../mother_deceased_coded/value='1065^YES^99DCT' or ../mother_deceased_coded/value='1067^UNKNOWN^99DCT' or ../mother_hiv_positive/value='1065^YES^99DCT' or ../mother_hiv_positive/value='1067^UNKNOWN^99DCT'), 'Needs Testing', 'Does Not Need Testing')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Invalid entry for Time for Last Meal!
Invalid entry year tested!
Invalid Blood Systolic Blood Pressure
Invalid Blood Diastolic Blood Pressure
Invalid entry for year of diagnosis!
Invalid entry for Random Blood Sugar!
Invalid entry for Random Blood Sugar!
Invalid entry for diastolic Blood Pressure! Diastolic cannot be more than Systolic
Invalid entry for Blood Sugar Level
If NONE is select, it should be the only option
You can not test without counseling
Only a maximum of three allowed.

bind.calculate:
if((/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and (/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed_1/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_3/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value!='664^NEGATIVE^99DCT'
or /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed_1/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT'))
or ((/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed_1/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value) and /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT') or (/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_3/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value='703^POSITIVE^99DCT'),
'Refer patient to a HIV Clinic',
if ((/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed_1/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' and (/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_3/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' or /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_3/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT')) or /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_branddetailed/hiv_ultra_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' or /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_3/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value='664^NEGATIVE^99DCT','Client is Negative', 'Refer patient to a HIV Clinic.'))

if((../hiv_test_detailed_2/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and (../hiv_test_detailed/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value!='664^NEGATIVE^99DCT'
or ../hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT'))
or ((../hiv_test_detailed/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = ../hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value) and ../hiv_test_detailed/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '703^POSITIVE^99DCT') or (/form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value='703^POSITIVE^99DCT'),
'Refer patient to a HIV Clinic',
if ((../hiv_test_detailed_2/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' and (../hiv_test_detailed/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' or ../hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT')) or ../hiv_test_detailed/hiv_rapid_test_qualitative/value = '664^NEGATIVE^99DCT' or /form/household/individuals/individual/obs/hiv_test_detailed_1/hiv_enzyme_immunoassay_qualitative/value='664^NEGATIVE^99DCT','Client is Negative', 'Refer to clinic for further testing.'))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: If No Complaints is select, it should be the only option
Maximum of 4 allowed and if NONE is select, it should be the only option
Follow-Up date must be in the future!

input.label: Survey Location
input.hint: Ensure you have a clear view of the sky.

input.label: Household ID
input.hint: Remember, a household is: 1. Father, wife/wives and children 2. Son, wife/wives and children in father's homestead 3. Child headed home 4. Mature man/woman living alone 5. Daughter/son with child/children living in parent house

select1.label: Survey Status
select1.hint: Were you accepted in?

input.label: Adults in Household
input.hint: Must be 13 years old and above. If none, enter 0.

input.label: Children in Household
input.hint: Must be less than 13 years old. If none, enter 0.

input.label: Total in Household
input.hint: Confirm this total number of adults and children with CHW.

input.label: Adults Eligible for Testing
input.hint: Must be 13 years old and above. If none, enter 0.

input.label: Children Eligible for Testing
input.hint: Must be less than 13 years old. If none, enter 0.

input.label: Total Land Owned
input.hint: Please enter in acres. If none, enter 0.

input.label: Number of Cows Owned
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Number of Goats Owned
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Number of Sheep Owned
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Children Between 3-20 Years
input.hint: Include all children in household.

input.label: Children Attending School
input.hint: Include pre-primary, primary through college.

input.label: Number of Bed Nets
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Household Counseling and Testing for the Household ID
input.hint: Please confirm this ID is correct.

item.label: Enter Age in Years or Months

input.label: Enter Phone Number
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Re-Enter Phone Number
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Individual Demographics
input.hint: Please write this demographics on the card and issue it out to the client.

input.label: Scan HCT AMRS ID
input.hint: Ensure you have enough light.

select1.label: Marital Status
select1.hint: Are you currently married or living with a partner?

select1.label: Do you have a regular partner?
Do you know the status of your partner?
House Status
select1.hint: A household resident is a person who is part of a household (including servants/employees).

select1.label: Occupation
select1.hint: Which occupation?

select1.label: Education Level
select1.hint: What is the highest education level that you finished?

input.label: Wage hours in the Past Week
input.hint: Include for wage and business.

input.label: Hours Worked Past Week in Housework
input.hint: For example, cooking and cleaning.

input.label: Times Visited Clinic Due to Sickness in Last Month
input.hint: If none, enter 0.

input.label: Amount of Money Spent on Medication in Last Month
input.hint: Value in Kshs

select1.label: Child Immunized
select1.hint: Has this child received any immunizations?

select1.label: Immunization Data Source
select1.hint: What is the source for immunization information?

select.label: Previous Immunizations
select.hint: Has the child received any of the following immunizations?"

select1.label: With fever?
select1.hint: Did the child have fever?

select1.label: Malaria test done
select1.hint: Was malaria test done?

select1.label: Test Result?
select1.hint: What was the test result?

select1.label: Program Name:
select1.hint: If HIV positive, did the patient enroll into HIV Care Program?

select1.label: DBS Taken?
select1.hint: Dried Blood Spot for HIV DNA PCR

select1.label: Ever delivered or pregnant?
select1.hint: This is a determinative question for CDM to capture data for females under age of 18 but currently pregnant or ever delivered

input.label: How long ago/When(HRS) was your last meal?
input.hint: If more than 6 hours before screening patient is considered to be fasting, if less than six hours then it is random

input.label: Random Blood Sugar(mmL)
input.hint: Laboratory measurement of the glucose level in the blood.(Minimum value 1.0 and maximum 30.0)
Laboratory measurement of the glucose level in the blood.(Minimum value 1.0 and maximum 30.0)
input.label: Fasting Blood Sugar(mmL)
High Blood Sugar. Please refer this client to clinic.
Systolic
input.hint: A clients's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position). Minimum value 50 and maximum 299

input.label: Diastolic Blood Pressure
input.hint: A client's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position). Minimum value 50 and maximum 299

input.label: High blood Pressure. Please refer this client to clinic.
Year of Diagnosis
input.hint: Year of Diagnosis

input.label: How many times have you been tested for HIV

select.label: HIV Disclosure to anyone specific?
select.hint: Have you disclosed your HIV status to any of the following people?

select1.label: Program Name:
select1.hint: If HIV positive, did the patient enroll into HIV Care Program?

select.label: Reason for not being in the care program

select1.label: Pretest Counseling
select1.hint: Did this client receive HIV counseling in this visit?

select.label: Reasons for Declining
select.hint: Reason for declining HIV testing from the HCT program.

item.label: Difficult to test one child and not others

select1.label: Test 1 Result
select1.hint: DETERMINE Test

select1.label: Test 2 Result
select1.hint: UNIGOLD Test

select1.label: Test 3 Result
select1.hint: LONG ELISA Test

select1.label: QA/QC Long Elisa Results
select1.hint: QA/QC Long Elisa Results

select1.label: Test 1 Result
select1.hint: KHB

select1.label: Test 2 Result
select1.hint: First Response

select1.label: Unigold test
select1.hint: Unigold

select1.label: QA/QC Long Elisa Results
select1.hint: QA/QC Long Elisa Results

select1.label: Testing Session
select1.hint: How was the HIV test session done?

select1.label: Obviously Pregnant?
select1.hint: Is the client pregnant?

input.label: EDD
input.hint: An estimation of the date in which a mother will give birth to her child (dd/mm/yyyy)

select1.label: Attending Antenatal Clinic
select1.hint: Is the client enrolled in Antenatal Care Service?

select1.label: Using mosquito net
select1.hint: Was the client using a mosquito net?

select1.label: Issued with mosquito net
select1.hint: Was the client issued with a mosquito net?

input.label: Please refer client to ANC Clinic

select1.label: Condom given?
select1.hint: Was condom given out during this visit?

item.label: MOST AT RISK PERSON GETTING HIV INFECTION

select1.label: Have you ever suffered from STI

select.label: Genitourinary
select.hint: Question which ascertains number of symptoms related to the genitourinary system. [1080]

select1.label: CIRCUMCISED
select1.hint: Question on encounter form: "Is patient circumcised?"

select1.label: Do you have more than one sexual partner
Year of Past Treatment
select1.hint: Year patient completed tuberculosis treatment.

select1.label: Completed 6 Months Treatment
select1.hint: Did the patient complete the 6-month tuberculosis treatment?

item.label: Repeat HIV Testing in three to six months
Referred to HIV Clinic, HIV Positive
Health Centre referral, Indeterminate HIV Test
Health Centre Referral, Child less than 18 months
Health Centre Referral, Blood Pressure Checkup
Health Centre Referral, Blood Sugar Checkup

select1.label: Client looks very sick?
select1.hint: This is a subjective assessment on client health condition by HCT counselor.
